doc.name: revZipEnumerateItems
doc.summary: Lists the items in a zip archive.

examples.example:
if "myZippedItem" is among the lines of revZipEnumerateItems(tArchive) then
beep
end if

description.p: Use the revZipEnumerateItems function to obtain a list of the items currently in an open zip archive. The archive must first have been opened with the revZipOpenArchive command.
The archivePath is the absolute path to the archive to list items in
This function returns a list of item names, one per line, in the archive. If the archive is empty, or an error has occurred then revZipEnumerateItems will return empty.
